Footballer Jose Antonio Reyes, 35, is killed in car crash as vehicle bursts into flames and also kills his cousin, 23, while a third passenger escapes but suffers burns
Former Arsenal star Jose Antonio Reyes died after he was involved in collision in Utrera, near Seville, Spain
Had three children; daughters Noelia and Triana and son Jose Antonio Jr and was married to Noelia Lopez
Reyes's 23-year-old cousin, Jonathan Ryes, also died in the crash and a the third occupant suffered burns



Reyes was involved in a traffic collision in Utrera, the town of his birth located just outside of Seville, in Spain this morning.

According to Spanish TV channel Deportes Cex, the crash, which happened at around 11:40am, is believed to have occurred on a road between Utrera and Seville and two more people were in the car.

He leaves behind three children; daughters Noelia and Triana, son Jose Antonio Jr and wife Noelia Lopez, who he married in June 2017.

It is reported one of of the other people in the car, his 23-year-old cousin, Jonathan Ryes, also died while the third occupant suffered burns.

replies.msg:
The 23-year-old played only five minutes as Arsenal lost to Barcelona in the Stade de France last May. And asked if the exclusion was the final straw after two years of struggling to settle in England, he replied: "Well, it was certainly a big factor in me leaving.

"You play all the matches all the way through the Champions League and then you're left out of the final. It was a massive blow. I missed out on one of the most important games of my career. That was really hard."

Reyes maintains that he did not fail as an Arsenal player, but that neither he nor his family were able to adapt to life away from Spain. "Things did work for me at Arsenal but I when I got the chance to come to Real Madrid, I didn't want to pass it up," he said. "Adapting to England was difficult, things like the weather and the language were hard for me. It was really quite difficult.

"My family is the most important thing to me. Both me and my family were unhappy in London. I was very conscious of the fact that they were not settled there. They weren't happy; now they are."

首位贏英超西國兵 亨利痛緬雷耶斯

【Now Sports-體育】雷耶斯英年早逝，球壇人士同聲一哭，前阿仙奴隊友亨利在社交網絡緬懷故友。

前阿仙奴殿堂級球星亨利與雷耶斯（Jose Antonio Reyes）曾在阿仙奴並肩作戰，後者是史上首位贏得英超的西班牙球員。亨利聞悉前隊友死訊後在twitter上載與雷耶斯的合照，並留言哀悼：「我為聽到有關雷耶斯的消息感到極度震驚。美妙的球員、無與倫比的隊友及傑出的人。我祝福他的家人與朋友延續力量與勇氣，度過這個艱難時刻。」

西維爾於周六中午透過球會官方社交網絡宣佈雷耶斯的死訊，消息指雷耶斯於周六早上在出生地塞維利亞市郊遇上交通意外，不幸離世，終年35歲。

雷耶斯於西維爾成名，及至2004年1月加盟阿仙奴，是該隊錄得不敗球季封王的成員之一。該翼鋒之後在2006/07年球季外借到皇家馬德里，贏得西甲錦標。他於2007年離開阿仙奴，及後分別為馬德里體育會及西維爾贏過兩次及3次歐霸盃錦標。他離世前效力西班牙乙組球會埃斯特馬杜拉。

圖片來源 : 互聯網

比利時較可靠的媒體<DH.be>:

Thomas Meunier已拒絕阿仙奴及其他俱樂部的offer，他決定加盟曼聯。該交易接近達成，轉會費2500萬歐。


鏡報 Tom Hopkinson:

巴塞爾中後衛 Éder Balanta (26歲,182cm) 被推薦給了阿仙奴，該球員對艾美利來說有巨大的吸引力。這位哥倫比亞國腳不但可以踢中後衛，還可以踢左後衛，且合同只剩一年，轉會費很划算，預計只需400萬鎊。
